title: David Lynch: A Remembrance Both Wonderful and Strange
overview: “A great American artist? Or America's greatest artist?…. He was the poet of the beautiful dark. We have no idea where this will lead us, but we have a definite feeling it will be a place both wonderful and strange.”  A special event screening curated by Seattle’s Beacon Cinema featuring a brand-new collage show of Lynch's greatest interviews, oddities, documentary pieces, short films, music videos, rarities, and secret mysteries.
